gui

Class LifeFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.LifeFileReader

  • public class LifeFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Can set up a JFileChooser and then convert a text file to a grid.

      • loadCol

        public static boolean[][] loadCol(java.io.File file)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a grid based on a text file. The file should look just like a grid, with '.' representing dead cells and '*' representing live cells.
        Parameters:
        file - a .col file.
        Returns:
        a boolean array representing the grid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
